name: Super Monkey Bathtub Racing (MGJ3 version)
description:
Welcome to the Super Monkey Bathtub Racing!

Here we have 3 tracks, 3 game modes and a S T O R Y !

4 interesting characters! (only one selectable for budget reasons)

Wonderful soundtrack stolen legally from corners of the interwebs!

early 2000s aesthetic!

Low budget as it was created for MonoGameJam3!

9/10 gamers recommend to download this game now... NOW! For free! What are you waiting for? Drift away into this exciting world of prerendered fake reality also known as 3D and hardcore gameplay!

P.S. the game is for windows only for budget reasons
